name: Spy Identification
description: Methods for identifying covert operatives and foreign intelligence threats.

cards.title: Behavioral Analysis of Espionage Agents
cards.description: Identifying suspicious behavioral patterns indicative of espionage activity.
bulletpoints: Identify signs of nervousness or over-prepared responses
Use deception detection techniques in interviews

cards.title: Analyzing Covert Communications
cards.description: Tracking clandestine messaging techniques used by foreign operatives.
bulletpoints: Monitor use of coded language in digital and verbal exchanges
Identify anomalies in encrypted communication methods
Use metadata analysis to track message transmission points
